org.magelan.drawing
Class Viewport

java.lang.Object
  org.magelan.drawing.Viewport
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
NamedViewport
public class Viewport
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

Defines metods to translate model space drawing coordinates to scaled, ready to draw on screen, coordinates.

Version:
3.1, 01/2005
Author:
Assen Antov
See Also:
Serialized Form
